name: Silver and Melus
description:
This card will record the number of types of Elemental DMG opposing characters have taken during this match as points of Attendant's Attentiveness. (Max 4 points)
End Phase: If you have at least 3 Attendant's Attentiveness points, discard this card and draw cards equal to the amount of Attendant's Attentiveness points.
